00065   void processOptions(UserServer userServer, const UMS_Data::ListAuthAccOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest)
00066   {
00067      std::string sqlListofAuthAccountInitial = sqlRequest;
00068 
00069      size_t userIdSize = options->getUserId().size();
00070      size_t authSystemIdSize = options->getAuthSystemId().size();
00071      bool isListAll = options->isListAll();
00072 
00073      if ((!userServer.isAdmin()) && (userIdSize!=0 || isListAll)) {
00074         UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00075         throw e;
00076      }
00077 
00078      //The admin option
00079      if(userIdSize!=0) {
00080         //To check if the user id is correct
00081         checkUserId(options->getUserId());
00082         sqlRequest=sqlListofAuthAccountInitial;
00083         addOptionRequest("userid", options->getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00084      }
00085      else {
00086        if(!isListAll) {
00087         addOptionRequest("userid", userServer.getData().getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00088      }
00089     }
00090 
00091      if(authSystemIdSize!=0) {
00092         //To check if the machine id is correct
00093         checkAuthSystemId(options->getAuthSystemId());
00094         if(!isListAll && userIdSize==0) {
00095           sqlRequest=sqlListofAuthAccountInitial;
00096           addOptionRequest("userid", userServer.getData().getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00097         }
00098         addOptionRequest("authsystemid", options->getAuthSystemId(), sqlRequest);
00099      }
00100 
00101   }

00109   UMS_Data::ListAuthAccounts* list()
00110   {
00111     std::string sqlListofAuthAccount = "SELECT authsystemid, userid, aclogin "
00112     " from authaccount, authsystem, users where authaccount.authsystem_authsystemid=authsystem.numauthsystemid and authaccount.users_numuserid=users.numuserid";

00118 
00119 
00120     //Creation of the object user
00121     UserServer userServer = UserServer(msessionServer);
00122     userServer.init();
00123     //if the user exists
00124     if (userServer.exist()) {
00125 
00126       //To process options
00127       processOptions(userServer, mparameters, sqlListofAuthAccount);
00128 
00129       boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> ListofAuthAccount (mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListofAuthAccount.c_str()));
00130       if (ListofAuthAccount->getNbTuples() != 0){
00131         for (size_t i = 0; i < ListofAuthAccount->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00132           results.clear();
00133           results = ListofAuthAccount->get(i);
00134           ii = results.begin();
00135 
00136           UMS_Data::AuthAccount_ptr authAccount = ecoreFactory->createAuthAccount();

00138           authAccount->setUserId(*(++ii));
00139           authAccount->setAcLogin(*(++ii));
00140           mlistObject->getAuthAccounts().push_back(authAccount);
00141         }
00142       }
00143     }
